title: Drawing, "Design for a Soup Tureen/Centerpiece (plan)", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, green ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp: in black ink at upper right: 70
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink at lower center: SOUPIERE MILIEU DE TABLE/3/PLAN; at lower right: JEAN PUIFORCAT/6. 41.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Oval tureen drawn in plan, molded edge body fitted with lid surmounted by an arched handle indicated in green ink below a faceted band flanked by similarly designed scroll handles. Underdrawing in graphite of tureen in golden section.
Elevation of tureen in the Puiforcat collection (1995-164-38).
Puiforcat Fabrication #: 70.
